name: Cat Simulator: Cute Pet 3D
description:
Be a cute kitten in Cat Simulator: Cute Pet 3D!

Run a kitten pet and explore a house in the simulator! Make troubles with your cute cat, smash everything. Complete funny cat missions, but beware of not cute dog. Earn coins and get pet levels. Use easy simulator's controls to run a kitten from dog. Be a real cat - eat mice, drink milk and sleep! Try kitten's time challenges - be a fast pet!

Features of Cat Simulator: Cute Pet 3D:

- 3D graphics
- Easy cute kitten controls in the simulator
- Big house to explore with cat
- Many objects to destroy for your pet
- Funny pet missions
- Nice cute kitten to play with
- Time challenge simulator
- Evil dog against cute cat

Let your kitten to smash, crash and drop in the pet simulator. Do what cute cat and dog usually do. Break TV, drop vases - be a troublemaking cute kitten in cat simulator! Enjoy 3D locations, roll a ball from one room to another. To be cute pet or not - it is your choice. Play kitten missions or free mode, find what cat's mission is better. Find mice and let your pet eat them!

Tease the dog in the kitten simulator! Who does he think he is, a cat?! Make a cat - dog war, the dog must know that kitten is the cute boss here. Or run away. The dog's teeth are really big, don't risk your pet. Instead, find a cat carpet and sleep. And after pet's recharge - continue cute kitten's adventures in simulator, full of destroyable objects.

We love cute pets: cats and kittens! We know what kittens like to do. Make a mess in pet simulator! But they are still so cute. Even when they run from dog! Special cat controls allow you to lead your cute kitten pet anywhere. Have you ever dreamt to have a pet - a kitten or a dog? Get it in our pet simulator. Spend all you day with cat.

Try cute cat's missions. They are fun! There is a time challenge in the cat simulator. Sometimes be a cute kitten is not so easy, but your pet can do it. Fell like a real cute kitten, but beware of the dog! Interact with objects, destroy them all in the pet simulator.

Play Cat Simulator: Cute Pet 3D all day! Enjoy being a cute kitten.
